decks.notes: The main idea behind this deck is to utilize Oloro, Ageless Ascetic as the commander of an aggressive strategy. The deck includes a variety of lands and spells that support a control-based playstyle, with a focus on disrupting the opponent's strategy while also utilizing powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite, and Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur. The deck includes a mix of card draw, counterspells, and removal spells to help control the board and protect the commander. Additionally, there are reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring back creatures from the graveyard, as well as powerful combo pieces like Living Death and Show and Tell to create explosive plays.

The core strategy of this deck is to control the game through countering spells, bouncing opposing permanents, and manipulating the opponent's deck. Vendilion Clique serves as both a disruptive threat and card filtering option. The deck includes a wide array of counterspells like Force of Will, Mana Leak, and Counterspell to stop the opponent's key plays. Additionally, cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Bribery provide card advantage and steal the opponent's best creature. The mana base is tailored to maximize Islands for Islandwalk synergies and offers utility lands like Maze of Ith and Wasteland. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily advancing its own through control and card advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing Doran, the Siege Tower's ability to switch the power and toughness of creatures to deliver aggressive, efficient beatdowns. It includes a variety of efficient creatures with high toughness, such as Tarmogoyf and Scavenging Ooze, as well as powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Toxic Deluge to control the board. The deck also includes powerful disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It aims to apply early pressure with efficient creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy with targeted removal and disruption spells, ultimately overwhelming them with a combination of aggro and control elements.

The deck focuses on utilizing graveyard manipulation, reanimation, and powerful creature combos to overwhelm the opponent in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 duel. The key strategy revolves around filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Buried Alive and Entomb, then reanimating them using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The Mimeoplasm is used as the commander to copy and combine powerful creature abilities, creating a versatile and threatening board state. The deck includes various powerful cards like Griselbrand, Primeval Titan, and Consecrated Sphinx to generate card advantage and control the game. Mana acceleration and disruption are also included to ensure a consistent and powerful gameplay experience.

The main focus of this deck is to maintain control of the game through counterspells, bounce effects, and removal while slowly building up a board presence with Geist of Saint Traft and other creatures. The deck includes a variety of permission spells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Mana Leak to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also features versatile removal options such as Swords to Plowshares, Oblivion Ring, and Wrath of God to deal with threats on the battlefield. Additionally, the deck has cards like Stoneforge Mystic, Umezawa's Jitte, and Sword of Fire and Ice to provide additional value and close out the game efficiently. The goal is to outlast the opponent and grind out a victory through controlling the game.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using powerful equipment to quickly overpower opponents. With Jenara, Asura of War as the commander, the deck includes cards like Umezawa's Jitte, Sword of Fire and Ice, and Sword of Feast and Famine to enhance the creatures' abilities. The deck also includes mana ramp cards like Birds of Paradise, Noble Hierarch, and Bloom Tender to accelerate the deployment of threats. With powerful cards like Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite and Sun Titan, the deck can quickly dominate the battlefield and apply pressure on opponents. The deck aims to establish board control early and maintain aggression throughout the game, ultimately overwhelming opponents with high-powered threats and efficient creature removal.

This deck focuses on creating a strong board presence quickly by utilizing Marath, Will of the Wild's abilities to generate tokens and control the battlefield. The deck includes a variety of utility creatures and spells to support this strategy, as well as powerful cards like Birthing Pod and Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for key pieces. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Purphoros, God of the Forge and Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker to provide additional win conditions and close out games efficiently. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure smooth mana development. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful synergies.

The deck aims to control the game using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw while setting up a game-winning combo with Doomsday. Oloro serves as a passive life gain engine, allowing the player to stall the game until they can assemble their combo pieces. Cards like Ad Nauseam and Dark Confidant help with card advantage and digging for combo pieces quickly. The inclusion of Laboratory Maniac as an alternate win condition with the Doomsday combo provides a way to win the game instantly if the combo is successfully executed. The deck is designed to disrupt opponents' strategies while assembling its own win condition efficiently.
